name: Bequests, devises, and gifts
text: [§414D-206]  Bequests, devises, and gifts.  Any bequest, devise, gift, grant, or promise contained in a will or other instrument of donation, subscription, or conveyance, that is made to a constituent corporation and that takes effect or remains payable after the merger, inures to the surviving corporation unless the will or other instrument otherwise specifically provides. [L 2001, c 105, pt of §1]
